question: Can I get a mortgage with an annual income of $75,000 and outstanding debts of $10,000?
true_answer: Yes, with income $75,000 and debts $10,000, you are eligible. DTI is 29%.

steps.content: Can I get a mortgage with an annual income of $75,000 and outstanding debts of $10,000?
